data.title: SD for the Adventuresome
data.meta_description: Calling all adrenaline junkies in San Diego. Looking for some adventure, look no further! Do you have for the need for speed? Visit K1 Racing Go Kart in Carlsbad,
data.text:
Calling all adrenaline junkies in San Diego. Looking for some adventure, look no further!

K1 Racing Go Kart

Do you have for the need for speed? Visit K1 Racing Go Kart in Carlsbad, CA. Compete against your friends and/or family and race to the finish line.

Where:

6212 Corte Del Abeto,

Carlsbad, CA 92011

Contact Info:

(760) 929-2225

Go Jump Oceanside (Skydiving)

One of the greatests adrenaline rushes is jumping out of a moving airplane. The best part of Go Jump is that while you are freefalling to the ground, you can take in the spectacular ocean views around you. For some it may take awhile to get your feet off the ground, but once you take that jump and pull your shoot, you are going to want to get right back on the plane and do it again.

Where:

480 Airport Road

Oceanside, CA 92058

Contact Info:

(760) 390-5867

IFLY Skydiving

Not a fan of heights or want a cheaper alternative to outdoor skydiving, visit the newly built iFLY in Oceanside, CA. Fluctuate up and down as you fly in a vertical wind tunnel that stimulates skydiving.

Where:

3178 Vista Way,

Oceanside, CA 92056

Contact Info:

(760) 606-4359

Torrey Pines Gliderport (Paragliding)

Torrey Pines Gliderport is the prime location for paragliding on the west coast. Fly with trained professionals or earn your own pilot license at North America’s top flight school.

Where:

2800 Torrey Pines Scenic Dr.

La Jolla, CA 92037

Contact:

(858) 452-9858

Scuba Diving

Not much of a fan of heights, how about traveling down to the depths? Earn your scuba diving license and visit some of San Diego’s greatest coves that are filled with various sea life and coral species.

Vital Rock Climbing Gym

Vital Climbing Gym is definitely somewhere you will want to check out if you love rock climbing or if you are just getting started. They have a gym location in Carlsbad and one in Oceanside. The vibe in this gym is unlike any other. They give members access to changing the music and 24 hour access to the space. It is a bouldering only gym and everyone is so encouraging and positive. They have fitness classes throughout the week. We recommend checking out Vital if you want to get some time in the gym or if you want to try rock climbing for the first time, the social and inviting atmosphere won’t disappoint. Feel like Spiderman as you climb across walls with no harness.

Where:

525 S Coast Hwy

Oceanside, CA 92054

Contact:

(760) 385-8209

Sky’s the Limit Ballooning Adventures

Take to the sky. Book with Sky’s the Limit Ballooning Adventures and travel into the clouds. Perfect for family, friends, or a a wonder date night between two loved ones.

Where:

3251 Camino De Los Coches

Carlsbad, CA 92009

Contact:

(760) 602-0295

Escape Room

Play Sherlock Holmes or Nancy Drew for a day as you gather clues to figure a way out! Muahaha. Codebreakers Escape Room is a local escape room that will test you to your wits end.

Where:

2401 Vista Way Suite F

Oceanside, CA 92054

Contact:

(760) 529-0882

Aquatic Aviation

Surge out of the water with Aquatic Aviation. The company offers both flyboard and hoverboard lessons and rentals. There is nothig quite like this experience. It’s the jetpack for water. You can flip and twirl around while being thrusted up by a pressurized hose that is attached to a jetski.

Where:

1335 Rosecrans St.

San Diego, CA 92106

Contact:

(888) 265-2728

Oceanside Adventures (Whale Watching)

Oceanside Adventures takes you and your party aboard a 50 foot boat across the Oceanside Harbor. Keep your eyes peeled because not only may you spot whales, but also dolphin pods.

Where:

S, 315 Harbor Dr.

Oceanside, CA 92054

Contact:

(888) 507-1130

San Diego Sailing Academy

Steer and control you own sails as you dash across the open ocean. Certified professionals from the San Diego Sailing Academy guide your group with step by step instructions.

Where:

1551 Shelter Island Dr.

San Diego, CA 92106

Contact:

(619) 223-6253
